name: Brick - Classic puzzle game
description:
Brick is a diverse and unbored classic casual puzzle game.

In the world which is full of stone spirits,
the ancient totemic stone were stucked in the Stonehenge,
you need to slide stones to rescue the totemic stone as soon as possible!
Hurry up,let's unfold the puzzle! Come on and save the world of Brick!

The way to play Brick is quite similar to a classic Chinese game called "Hua Rong Dao",
it is easy to learn but hard to master,
you need think over and keep trying to get through puzzles.

You will be counted in each puzzle stage,
so just be faster in your game to refresh your record to be the king of ranking.

The vision of Brick is bright, is suitable for all ages, especially for the teenagers as it brings them either relaxation or practice, hundreds of different stages will absolutely make you enjoyable!

Features:
bright colors on the vision for mass adoration of young people.
Simple guidance makes the game easier.
Hint system that will guide you through the puzzle
Hundreds of stages give you constant adventures.
Ranking system brings you more challenge and best solution.
